reviews.text: 1785 TX-26 Suite 200, Grapevine, TX 76051 We recently completed a project that includes an open-gable patio cover, Roman Carvestone patio and walkway, and a convenient outdoor kitchenette, all designed to create the ultimate place to relax or entertain. Grapevine homeowners who love spending time outside will appreciate how this design blends comfort, style, and functionality.

I would like to take a minute to comment on the job that allied did on our backyard. We moved into a new house and needed a complete makeover of the backyard. Allied's people were very professional, on time, and diligent about the work that they did. Everything turned out great. They are a wonderful contractor to work with.
